column4: Hey. I installed kubuntu-desktop yesterday just to try it out, and now i wanna get rid of it. apt-get remove kubuntu-desktop wont do, because all the with-coming software will still be on my ubuntu system. How do i get rid of all kubuntu-desktops dependencies?
you wana remove linux or just kubuntu package?
just kubuntu and its dependencies. I'd like my gnome back without all those kde apps :P
